title: Pbe
body: I just got a pbe account and logged in but its on my regular account and all my ip and rp are the same as my regular account.Can anyone help pls

replies.body:
Did you make sure you're signing in on the [PBE Client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client) itself?

If not, then you may literally be signing into your live account.

well the thing is its pbe for sure its just i didnt get my rp and ip on pbe
and it just shows my currency for my live servers
was i supposed to create a whole new pbe account cause when i tested for pbe i put in my main account info thx for help in advance
also i forgot to mention i saw online that u start off with a certain amount of rp and ip and mine didnt get any and all the champs in the store are the same price as in the live servers
Can you [send me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of you logging into the PBE client (without showing your username). Thanks!
https://drive.google.com/drive/u/2/my-drive  go to this link and its the league image one

I actually just took a look at your account and see that you don't have PBE access, you have *Alpha Client access*. The Alpha client is the new client that will eventually replace the current one. This is **not** the testing environment for proposed changes to the game. Check out our [Alpha Client FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ) for a complete rundown on the system.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I didn't know how to get on the PBE boards so maybe you will read this and pass it on, but for some reason.  Rammus level one taunt wasn't working on an enemy yi for its full duration.  I do not know if it had to do with the merk treads or not.  But even then it wasn't even long enough for the enemy Yi to attack me.   Can not remember exact items on said enemy Yi.  My items were, Cloth Armor + Nabi Tabis + Cahin vest + refillable Potion. At that time.
You can find the PBE Boards right [here.](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/) I definitely suggest posting this there so it can be tracked!
